title: Easy Burritos
directions: Cut thighs into medium slices; toss with 2 Tbsp chili powder and 1 Tbsp cumin. In a hot, oiled pan on medium, saute the slices until browned, about 4 minutes. Add 1 cup crushed or pureed tomatoes and some chopped oregano. Simmer on medium low until the chicken is tender, 10 to 15 minutes. Serve in a 10" tortilla with lettuce, salted sliced avocado, cheddar, and hot sauce.
ingredients: 4 boneless, skinless thighs, seasoned well with salt and pepper
